attributes.action: Disalow moves made by Banks to abolish free bank accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed charges that banks wish to levy on current accounts will drive the poor further in to debt and damage the economy.

In a country where almost no jobs are cash in hand, forcing people to have bank accounts, it is unfair to then charge them for the privelege when banks are already making record profit.
